post:
Merry Christmas from ProximCloud! (Shared Hosting in London from $1.10/mo!)

london, proximcloud, shared, uk December 12, 2020 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Merry Christmas from Ben at ProximCloud!  Or being that they’re British, is that Happy Christmas?  Is this a gift from Santa Claus or Father Christmas?

Whatever it is, it’s certainly no piece of coal – they’ve returned with a nice shared offer starting at $1.10/month!  Good now through December 30.

Even better yet, ProximCloud have just rolled out their biennial and triennial billing cycles! Still not impressed? If you purchase their XMAS P2 service on an annual, biennial or triennial cycle, you even receive a free .com, .net or .org domain!

ProximCloud started sharing offers with us back in April, then returned in September to show off their website redesign, and were last featured in November.

They’re coming up on three years in business (founded 28th February 2018).  They feature cPanel on pure SSD, 24×7 support, and the usual trimmings – including 20Gbpx of DDoS protection.  They’ve accumulated many positive reviews on TrustPilot.  Here’s a little more about them in their own words:

“ProximCloud is a small website hosting business, which has been in operation for over two years (since 28th Feb 2018), which has striven based on the reliability and low-cost factors of our services. ProximCloud always puts the customer first, and has ensured to provide our customers with many support-methods to ensure they can reach us when they need it, and when it suits them.”

Their WHOIS is public.  Please review their TOS before signing up.  They accept PayPal.  If you decide to give them a go, please before to comment below and let us know how it goes!

Now read more to see the offers!
